trans-unit.source: Provides methods you can use to perform miscellaneous tasks in an Outlook add-in, such as creating form region controls, form region manifest objects, and custom actions.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用于在 Outlook 加载项执行杂项任务的方法，如创建表单区域控件、表单区域清单对象和自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Factory> object, use the `Globals.Factory` property in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.Factory>对象，请使用`Globals.Factory`项目中的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[对 Office 项目中对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" /> that represents the native form region.
trans-unit.target: 表示本机表单区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension" /> 接口的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a an instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionControl" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 创建实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionControl" /> 接口的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionControl" /> that is based on a user control.
trans-unit.target: 基于用户控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> interface with a default name.
trans-unit.target: 创建实现具有默认名称的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> 接口的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> that represents a custom action.
trans-unit.target: 表示自定义操作的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示自定义操作的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> class by using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用指定名称实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> 类的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> that represents a custom action.
trans-unit.target: 表示自定义操作的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" />。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.Name%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction> to `name`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.Name%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction>到`name`。

trans-unit.source: The Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: The mode of the Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项的模式。

trans-unit.source: This mode is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此模式由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> 枚举表示。

trans-unit.source: The type of form region that loads.
trans-unit.target: 加载的表单区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: This mode is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此模式由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> 枚举表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the form region should appear for <c>outlookItem</c>.
trans-unit.target: 指示表单区域是否应针对 <c>outlookItem</c> 显示的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionInitializingEventArgs" /> object that provides data for the <c>FormRegionInitializing</c> event of the form region factory class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionInitializingEventArgs" /> 对象，用于提供表单区域工厂类的 <c>FormRegionInitializing</c> 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionInitializingEventArgs" /> that provides data for the <c>FormRegionInitializing</c> event of the form region factory class.
trans-unit.target: 提供表单区域工厂类的 <c>FormRegionInitializing</c> 事件的数据的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionInitializingEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a form region manifest that describes how the form region appears in Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 创建描述表单区域在 Outlook 中的显示方式的表单区域清单。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionManifest" /> that describes how the form region appears in Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 描述表单区域在 Outlook 中的显示方式的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionManifest" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" /> that represents the native form region.
trans-unit.target: 表示本机表单区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IImportedFormRegionExtension" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IImportedFormRegionExtension" /> 接口的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Microsoft Office Outlook form region that is based on an Outlook Form Storage (*.ofs) file.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于 Outlook 表单存储 (*.ofs) 文件的 Microsoft Office Outlook 表单区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegion" /> that represents a form region that is based on an Outlook Form Storage (*.ofs) file.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 Outlook 表单存储 (*.ofs) 文件的 Microsoft Office Outlook 表单区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegion" />。
